website_summaries.verdict: Retro-inspired running sneakers like the Adidas ZX 750 assure users a supportive, lightweight, and cushioned experience. Bringing back the appeal of Adidas ZX runner shoes from the 1980s, this kick packs stable and supportive features from the Torsion system that has been a signature of this line of shoes.Priced affordably, this retro runner offers a lot of possibilities for styling and recreational running for many Adidas sneaker fans.
pros: The vast majority of reviewers find the Adidas ZX 750 a very comfortable running-inspired sneaker with the injection-molded EVA cushioning midsole
Compared to previous ZX 750 versions, others have noted that the latest model feels more lightweight
Several commenters note how these retro-inspired kicks are marked with stability and ample support from the Torsion System
Some customers note the breathable mesh upper felt airy as the material allows airflow around the shoe better than the perforations in previous iterations
Models with bright colorways and 3-D effect on the upper make the shoe stylish to the liking of many sneaker fans
The rubber outsole felt solid with high grip and traction on various surfaces, others have noted
A significant number of users find this a well-constructed, durable and long-lasting shoe
A couple of commenters in their Adidas ZX 750 reviews note how they like the low-top kicks as they are great for everyday use with minimal maintenance needed as a daily beater
cons: A couple of wearers observe that the EVA midsole feels hard compared to current running shoe releases of the brand
Some users think the leather material feels more durable compared to the mesh material used in some overlays of the newer model

customer_reviews.title: Adidas are by far my favourite brand of trainer
customer_reviews.text: Adidas are by far my favourite brand of trainer. They do seem to come up a little snug but that is down to Adidas have changed their sizing. A 10.5 would be ideal but they don't come in that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: THESE SHOES ARE COUNTERFEIT AND THEY ARE NOT SIZE 8 . THE LABEL STATES 8 BUT THEY ARE ACTUALLY SIZE 12 AND THEY LABEL IS COUNTERFEIT AND THE QUALITY IS POOR.
customer_reviews.author: sean jones

customer_reviews.title: Made from different quality if material
customer_reviews.text: I seen these trainers in a shop and was impressed with the fit and how well made they were but when I got the ones I ordered they were made from a different material from the ones i seen in shop. I would like to know if these are old stock there for made from different material
customer_reviews.author: Brian Magee

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight ZX 750!
customer_reviews.text: I have several other pairs of Adidas ZX 750's, as they are so comfortable, tough and nice looking. However these are lighter and more breathable than the other ZX 750's, due to a mesh upper. I shall look forward to wearing these in the summer, as the other ZX 750's can get a little too hot for the warmer weather. Great quality trainers with tough soles. I am a size 9 but with all Adidas, I need to get a 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: N. French

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: These don't feel like real Adidas. Very plastic and can actually see the glue at the side of the stripes. Very unimpressed considering I mainly buy Adidas. Tempted to send them back to Aidas to make sure not counterfeit
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: A bit small
customer_reviews.text: Very good item,well made and look sturdy enough to take a lot of abuse at the gym. I ordered my shoe size,7. With thick sport socks they are a little snug,not overly so making them downright uncomfortable ,but just enough so as you'd notice. With thinner socks they are ok. I suppose they'll wear in with use. Maybe should have ordered a half size larger ? But overall am quite satisfied with the deal. Good product and a good price and quick delivery. Rating 5 stars because the only problem was of my own making,nothing wrong with the shoes themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Riandaj

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: It's like 1984 all over again the was fantastic then and just the same now and cheaper then 1984 I pay 75.00 then mad
customer_reviews.author: DWC

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious of sizing
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 11 and I had to send these size 11s back as they were WAY too big, felt like a 13) I'll probably try a 10 instead as they are nice shoes and I would like to find a pair that fits, but the sizing is off in my experience so bear that in mind when you place your order.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: People are giving 1star reviews but I can not see ...
customer_reviews.text: People are giving 1star reviews but I can not see anything wrong with them. Spot one classics. Nothing wrong with the quality I can assure you. I've worn adidas since I was 12 (1984). Top trainers
customer_reviews.author: Shill

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a pair of these for ages! Look good and really comfy! I have size 11 wide feet and the 11/46 fit perfectly. Just need to keep them hidden from the missus now as she doesn’t like my large collection of trainers!
customer_reviews.author: Mark31

customer_reviews.title: Absolute bargain buy! 😜
customer_reviews.text: Absolute bargain buy!! Compared to other sport shops & there prices. Well packed, very fast delivery & all in all A+++
customer_reviews.author: mariat77

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived swiftly and excellent quality as you would expect from Adidas..well pleased
customer_reviews.author: bobbyboy

customer_reviews.title: Worth their money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent worth their money for their price won't get them cheaper anywhere else
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present and they looked good. Fit ok with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Mrs T A Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband very comfortable and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: wendy rowland

customer_reviews.title: Got what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This item was delivered really quick, really comfortable fit really well and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Loves these trainers so much I have bought 2 in a row
customer_reviews.author: Karl Martin

customer_reviews.title: sizing seems much smaller than usual
customer_reviews.text: i found that the size is much smaller compared to other Adidas trainers. I take an 8.5 and it was much smaller than usual. I have ordered a size 9 and a 9.5 now to see which fits the best as the 8.5 was really very small. You may need to order one size up or at least a half size up to be comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Good, comfortable and stylish trainers. Bought for around £20 less than the price in high street retailers, I was worried if these would be the real deal. They definitely are and come with the usual Adidas quality packaging and build quality. Would highly recommend these trainers.
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: Will bye again
customer_reviews.text: Received today,cant till you about the size as they are for my partner's Christmas present.but a 5 star packed well good service.And love the trainers
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poore quality, stitching came undone not long after I had them. Seem a little large for the size. I'll stick to buying genuine one's from JD.
customer_reviews.author: Woz

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: From experience, Adidas tend to be on the small side. I am normally a size 11 but ordered a size 12 and they fit perfectly. High quality shoe as expected from Adidas at a very reasonable price. Very fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: R M Slade

customer_reviews.title: Adidas ZX750
customer_reviews.text: Love my new ZX750`s i had been lookin for a while to find these in my size and when i found them i was happy, i was even more happy when they arrived and they are very comfy trainers! They also arrived before the expected delivery date which was a bonus, Very happy satisfied customer :)
customer_reviews.author: Isla

customer_reviews.title: Not sure worth the price but good support
customer_reviews.text: Good enough quality but overpriced for what you get and as with Adidas you can never be sure on the sizing, fits ok, but a bit snugger than the sizing would suggest it would be
customer_reviews.author: GEsPM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: my 3rd pair of these trainers excellent quality and service
customer_reviews.author: Gazza

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable trainers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend's birthday. He was over the moon with them. Will defo buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Noisy Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Retro styled trainer from Adidas
customer_reviews.text: Having worn Nike for a while I found these Adidas trainers difficult to get along with. The sides of the shoe were so high that they were painful on my feet and I didn't find them comfortable or supportive. Size 9 was too small for me so I had to return. Will not be replacing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: My second pair of ZX 750s and as good as the first
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of ZX 750s and as good as the first! Use them for the gym and are great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking trainers
customer_reviews.text: Very retro cool looks,superb fit and great quality. I love these trainers,the petrol blue and orange stripes go so well together but they dont just look good they are made really well and fit good . I wear a size 10 but as its an adidas running shoe I went for half size up.
customer_reviews.author: looy750

customer_reviews.title: present for hubby
customer_reviews.text: bought for hubby for xmas , was good fit , quick delivery , good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy trainers and they look good too!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy trainers very supportive as I suffer from planta fasciitis. Size is generous but not too big. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: tight fit...
customer_reviews.text: Very tight if you have wider feet when first trying on, no time to return due to going on holiday, put 5 pairs of socks on to stretch them out, painful after an hour or two but fit lovely now...id recommended getting a half size bigger for comfort
customer_reviews.author: NEIL P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable training shoe's to wear yes I am so pleased with them thanks very much okay
customer_reviews.author: Mr David Mcallister

customer_reviews.title: Runs slightly big
customer_reviews.text: Sizing runs slightly bigger than my other Adidas footwear but use different insoles to standard so not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ian H

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Zx 750 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Mens Zx 750 from adidas combines a Mesh & Synthetic upper with a durable Rubber sole. These Trainers feature Lace-up fastening, cushioned insole and Textile lining. Finished with adidas branding, the style BB1218 comes in a White Blue colourway.
feature_bullets: Der ZX 750 ist ein klassischer freizeitsneaker für Herren von adidas für Alltag und Freizeit.
